text: Hot summer is here.
Because I have fur, I suppose I feel hotter than everyone.
Yappity-yap~ It's Francis!
This time, in order to enjoy hot Japanese summer and to get through it in cooling ways,
let's head off to eat cooling sweets of Japanese summer!
First up is KAKIGORI CAFE & BAR yelo!
Which one should I have...
I'd go for the popular menu.
When a woman becomes a bride, she takes this arare with her, right?
I did some studies!
The ice is fluffy!
It's really transparent!
Sweet milk at the bottom!
I want more!
I recommend this one to Chef, who loves chocolates!
You can also enjoy alcohol, right?
I shall recommend this one to my friend who loves drinking!
The syrups are handmade, and there are many kinds!
They change the menu every month!
Next, I came to a popular shop where people make queues, even during cold seasons:
Kakigori Atelier Sekka!
When there is a queue...
First, write your name on the reservation list outside.
Second, the staff will let you know how long it will be before you can get in.
Third, when you get back, you get in according to the order on the reservation list.
There's no need to wait outside all the time!
While we are waiting, let's stroll around in the shopping street of Sugamo Jizo, where Kakigori Atelier Sekka is located!
Let's ask the people of this town about which spots they recommend!
This is a popular icon of the street: Sugamon.
They say your romance works out if you touch his buttock!
We arrived at Togenuki Jizoson Kogan-ji Temple.
It's right near Kakigori Atelier Sekka!
When you visit the temple, you wash your hands clean...
They say if you put the smoke on an affected area, it shall be healed!
The guardian deity is sitting at the back of the temple.
Let me be healthy and eat a lot of delicious food.
Please hear my prayer.
I got omikage, which has a drawing of the guardian deity!
It's about time I return to Kakigori Atelier Sekka!
